Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that state Sen. Glenn Grothman said "he didn’t believe women belonged in the workplace" but belonged "at home, cooking and cleaning and having babies."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or video footage to prove that Glenn Grothman made the statement.

Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Glenn Grothman did not make the statement, as there is no video evidence to support it.
